title: Strengthening App Development Practical Skills: Large-Scale MIMO Communication System Design and Optimization Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain robust precoding design principles for large-scale MIMO systems under imperfect channel state information (CSI) conditions.
Learners can conduct simulation experiments to optimize precoding vectors using neural network-based methods.
Learners can apply flexible precoding design approaches in multi-antenna user environments and analyze their performance.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
